hangle: 최근 황태자 전하께서 유흥가에 금화를 뿌리며 돌아다닌다는 걸 아시나요?
first_translate: did you know that the crown prince has been throwing gold coins around in the red-light district?
second_translate: did you know that the crown prince has been tossing gold coins around in the entertainment district?

first_translate: yes, I really didn’t want to know about it,
second_translate: Yes, I really don't want to know, but...

first_translate: but unfortunately, the priscilla family’s intelligence network picked it up.
second_translate: Unfortunately, it got caught in the Priscilla family's intelligence network.

hangle: 현대 사회로 따지면 술집에서 여자를 끼고 지폐를 뿌리는 사람이군.
first_translate: so he’s like a man in modern society who throws money around in a bar while surrounded by women.
second_translate: So, in modern terms, he's like a man who throws money around in a bar while surrounded by women.

hangle: 한 방 먹일 준비는 다 되었답니다.
first_translate: I’m ready to get back at him.
second_translate: I’m ready to get back at them.
My ears are going to burst...

hangle: 경기 하나 끝났다고 저렇게 함성을 지르는 거야?
first_translate: why are they cheering so much just because one match ended?
second_translate: Are they really cheering that loudly just because one match ended?

first_translate: we’ve finished stationing people at all the entrances.
second_translate: We've finished positioning the personnel at the entrances.

first_translate: also, the next match is the main event of the day.
second_translate: Also, the next match is said to be today's main event.

hangle: 오늘은 정말 여태껏 공개한 적 없는 마물을 소개하겠습니다!
first_translate: today, we will introduce a demonic beast that has never been revealed before!
second_translate: Today, we will introduce a demonic beast that has never been publicly revealed before!

first_translate: ...a new species of demonic beast found in the dead lands!
second_translate: It's a newly discovered species of demonic beast from the Dead Lands!

first_translate: a demonic beast from the dead lands...?!
second_translate: A demonic beast from the Dead Lands...?!

hangle: 흉폭한 게 딱 봐도 광폭화가 진행된 마물이에요.
first_translate: ...is clearly a demonic beast that has gone berserk.
second_translate: That thing is clearly a demonic beast that has gone berserk.

first_translate: it should be fine since there’s a magic barrier.
second_translate: It should be fine since there's a protective spell.
It’s been holding up so far.

hangle: 방어 마법은 아마 곧 무너질 거예요.
first_translate: the magic barrier will probably collapse soon.
second_translate: The defensive magic will probably collapse soon.

hangle: 경, 출입구에 인원 배치 다 끝났다고 했죠?
first_translate: sir, you said the men have been stationed at the entrances, right?
second_translate: Sir, you said the personnel have been stationed at the entrances, right?

first_translate: then let’s move up the plan.
second_translate: Then let's move the plan forward.
Why is everything turning out like this?!
What is the meaning of this?!

hangle: 대체 어떤 놈이 이런 짓을 벌인 거지?!
first_translate: who the hell is behind this?!
I won’t let them get away with this.
second_translate: I won’t let them off the hook if I find them.

first_translate: someone is walking into the arena.
it was all that bastard’s doing.
second_translate: It was all that illegitimate child's doing.

first_translate: do you think I’ll just sit back and let this happen?!
second_translate: Do you think I'll just stand by and take this?!

first_translate: you want to be free, don’t you?
second_translate: Don't you want to be free?

hangle: 그 천한 사생아 새끼를 통째로 씹어 먹어 버리라고!
